data.name: "Flower World" is a game where every single user who uses the app or takes care of at least one flower will get their own island where they can arrange and "plant" their real flowers in the metaverse.
data.value: "Flower World" is a game where every single user who uses the app or takes care of at least one flower will get their own island where they can arrange and "plant" their real flowers in the metaverse.

data.name: "World of Flowers" is a system equipped with artificial intelligence and automatic recognition of types and varieties of flowers.
data.value: Welcome to "World of Flowers", a harmonious blend of technology and nature where the digital realm meets the verdant beauty of our world. At its core, this platform offers a comprehensive Web3 infrastructure dedicated to gardening, allowing users to grow, nurture, and even earn cryptocurrency from their virtual flowers. Dive into a universe where every petal counts, and every action reverberates with the love for our planet.

data.name: Anyone who takes care of at least one flower will receive a free island in the Metaverse.
data.value: Anyone who takes care of at least one flower will receive a free island in the Metaverse.

data.name: Charities
data.value: Charities

data.name: Chat with our flower recognition bot and send him pictures of flowers, he immediately will respond with the sort of the and information how to take care of it.
data.value: Chat with our flower recognition bot and send him pictures of flowers, he immediately will respond with the sort of the and information how to take care of it.

data.value: Crypto Token

data.name: Even if you don't have plants, you can buy some from the NFT shop and still continue playing.
data.value: Even if you don't have plants, you can buy some from the NFT shop and still continue playing.

data.name: GRDN token is the base currency in the entire infrastructure. All donations and causes, all rewards received for taking care of the flowers, as well as the metaverse are in the main crypto currency GRDN.
data.value: GRDN token is the base currency in the entire infrastructure. All donations and causes, all rewards received for taking care of the flowers, as well as the metaverse are in the main crypto currency GRDN.

data.name: Home - World of Flowers
data.value: Home - World of Flowers

data.name: In it, users not only grow but can also develop and sell their best photos of their most beautiful flowers. Every single photo in the system can be created as an NFT and thus either sold in the shop or used in the flower metaverse.
data.value: In it, users not only grow but can also develop and sell their best photos of their most beautiful flowers. Every single photo in the system can be created as an NFT and thus either sold in the shop or used in the flower metaverse.

"World of Flowers" is your portal to the blockchain world.

data.name: The donation system in "World of Flowers" is a unique way that users,together, can save endangered places or clear a polluted forest of waste.
data.value: The donation system in "World of Flowers" is a unique way that users,together, can save endangered places or clear a polluted forest of waste.

data.name: The Metaverse can be played freely by all flower lovers.
data.value: The Metaverse can be played freely by all flower lovers.

data.name: The mobile application for flowers
data.value: The mobile application for flowers

data.name: The mobile application is a way to identify flowers and plan their best cultivation according to their type, season and weather conditions where the flower is located.
data.value: The mobile application is a way to identify flowers and plan their best cultivation according to their type, season and weather conditions where the flower is located.

data.name: The mobile application will keep reminding you when you need to water your plants and you will never forget to leave them dry again.
data.value: The mobile application will keep reminding you when you need to water your plants and you will never forget to leave them dry again.

data.name: The more flowers you have in the "World of Flowers", the more GRDN Coin you will earn per day if you play.
data.value: The more flowers you have in the "World of Flowers", the more GRDN Coin you will earn per day if you play.

data.name: The user starts their journey by downloading the flower app. Immediately after, he will be prompted to take a photo or upload a photo of the flower he wishes to add and will receive a QR code for quick information that he can use to put on the pot or to sell real flowers in a shop. The app will automatically recognize the type of flower and start reminding the user when it needs watering.
data.value: The user starts their journey by downloading the flower app. Immediately after, he will be prompted to take a photo or upload a photo of the flower he wishes to add and will receive a QR code for quick information that he can use to put on the pot or to sell real flowers in a shop. The app will automatically recognize the type of flower and start reminding the user when it needs watering.

data.name: Web3 Infrastructure for gardening, growing, <br class='d-none d-md-block'> selling and earning crypto from your flowers
data.value: Web3 Infrastructure for gardening, growing, <br class='d-none d-md-block'> selling and earning crypto from your flowers

data.name: When you take good care of your garden, let it take care of you. Go to the NFT store and sell your collection of photos of your most beautiful flower, and if you continue to take care of it, each subsequent photo will be of a higher level and that will make it more valuable.
data.value: When you take good care of your garden, let it take care of you. Go to the NFT store and sell your collection of photos of your most beautiful flower, and if you continue to take care of it, each subsequent photo will be of a higher level and that will make it more valuable.

data.name: World of Flowers (with icons)
data.value: 🌼 World of Flowers 🌺

data.name: Your island will grow with the number of flowers that you have. You can even add decorations to your island and invite other players to visit it.
data.value: Your island will grow with the number of flowers that you have. You can even add decorations to your island and invite other players to visit it.
